title: 'I love them': Woman denies murdering ex in-laws after serving them poisonous mushrooms
description: A woman who served four family members poisonous mushrooms before three of them died has tearfully denied doing anything wrong - as homicide detectives investigate her as a suspect in the case.

title: Italy to spend €2.9m to tackle invasion of aggressive blue crabs
description: Italy has said it will spend €2.9m (£2.5m) to tackle an invasion of aggressive crabs that is threatening the country's role as one of the top producers of clams in the world - and potentially one of its signature pasta dishes.

title: Lauren James apologises and promises to 'learn' after World Cup red card for stamping on Nigeria player
description: England forward Lauren James has apologised to the Nigerian opponent she stamped on during their World Cup clash.

title: YouTube chef charged over murdering and dismembering man
description: A YouTube chef has been charged with murdering and dismembering a Colombian surgeon on a Thai island.

title: Thousands line streets to say goodbye as Sinead O'Connor is laid to rest
description: Sinead O'Connor has been remembered as a singer and activist whose "voice moved a generation of young people", as stars including U2's Bono and Bob Geldof attended her funeral and thousands of mourners lined the streets to pay their respects.

title: Vegan burger firm's revenue plunges amid fall in demand for plant-based food
description: Beyond Meat said its revenue has plunged by nearly a third as demand for its plant-based burgers, sausages and other products fell despite price cuts.

title: Countries are meeting to talk about the Amazon - this is why it's so important to protect it
description: It's twice the size of India, spread across eight countries, a territory, and home to over 16,000 tree species - the Amazon rainforest is one of the most biodiverse places on the planet.

title: Italy introduces surprise windfall tax on banks' interest rate profits
description: The Italian government has introduced a surprise 40% windfall tax on the profits made by banks from high interest rates.

title: Woman in critical condition after shark attack at New York City beach
description: A woman has been left in a critical condition after she was attacked by a shark off one of New York City's most popular beaches.

title: Thousands evacuated as wildfires sweep towards the Algarve
description: Hundreds of firefighters in Portugal are battling a wildfire, which is sweeping southward towards the Algarve.

title: Thousands of Scouts evacuated from World Jamboree site due to storm threat
description: Thousands of Scouts who survived soaring temperatures and dire sanitation at the World Scout Jamboree in South Korea have now been forced to leave as a tropical storm approaches.

title: Thousands of scouts evacuated from World Jamboree site as typhoon approaches South Korea
description: Thousands of scouts from around the world have begun moving from their campsite on South Korea's coast to inland venues ahead of a tropical storm that is forecast to bring intense rain and strong winds.
